title: Scarborough and Markham South Asian Foodscape (1996 - 2016)
description: This dataset contains the locations, names, and classifications of grocery stores and restaurants in Scarborough and Markham, Ontario for the years 1996, 2001, 2006, and 2016.

Score.description: A metric generated by ArcGIS Pro's Geocoding tool that represents how well each retailer's address was matched to a latitude and longitude. This ranges from 0 to 100 where 100 represents a perfect match.

year.description: The year of the Yellow Pages directory that the retailer was recorded in.

YP_sect.description: The section of the Yellow Pages directory that the retailer was recorded in.

name.description: The name of the retailer recorded in the Yellow Pages.

cuisine.description: The classification of the retailer. Classifications include south asian, not south asian, ethnic, indian, pakistani, sri lankan, or bangladeshi.

geometry.description: The point location of the retailer.
